welcome.text: I'm a Chatbot that can make easier your searches in the Web. What are you looking for?

entity.text: There is nothing matching "@slotForEntity". Here are some examples you can get

target.text: Looking for things matching "@entity". What type of things are you interested in?

source.text: Looking for "@target" matching "@entity". Should I look into some place in particular?

results.text: I found @slotForResults results from "@source". I will show you the first results.

explore.text: Do you want to explore more about them? You can filter results by some feature, get them ordered, or do operations like get the average, etc.

order.text: Here you have the results from "@source" ordered by @slotForOrdering. Do you want to explore more about them?

less than.text: Here you have the results from "@source" with price less than @value. Do you want to explore more about them?
